meanings.definition: The quality or state of being abortive.
meanings.sent1: Her project's abortivenesses were evident in its incomplete state.
meanings.sent2: The abortivenesses of the plan led to its ultimate failure.
meanings.sent3: The abortivenesses of the cake baking left everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: The abortivenesses of the relationship left a trail of broken hearts.
meanings.sent5: The abortivenesses of the seed planting resulted in no growth at all.

meanings.definition: The tendency to fail or be unsuccessful.
meanings.sent1: Despite his efforts, his business showed signs of abortivenesses.
meanings.sent2: The abortivenesses of the venture were disappointing to all involved.
meanings.sent3: The abortivenesses of the magic trick made the audience chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The abortivenesses of the race left the runner feeling defeated.
meanings.sent5: The abortivenesses of the rescue mission left everyone feeling helpless.

meanings.definition: The act of terminating a process prematurely.
meanings.sent1: The abortivenesses of the meeting surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The project's abortivenesses were due to lack of planning.
meanings.sent3: The abortivenesses of the movie screening caused confusion among viewers.
meanings.sent4: The abortivenesses of the concert left the audience disappointed.
meanings.sent5: The abortivenesses of the game ending early upset the players.
